entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as waiting for something or someone, and he drops to his knees when a white light flies through the air.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking over his shoulder at Snape, and he thinks of lightning when the white light appears.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore Apparates before Snape, and his face is illuminated by the light cast by his wand.
